page.title: 15A TYPICAL DAY FOR MARIE
page.content: A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MARIE AGED 10. I wake up in my quilted bed ready to go down to eat my poached egg on toast for breakfast. I have to go to school in green skirt, white blouse and a green cardigan. I travel to school by coach and when we get there we go straight into the playground. When I get to school I do some reading and I have a book of maths work. In school we have an assembly and all the children gather together. We have dinner at 12 noon and after we have another playtime and more lessons. I go home at 3.30 pm and at 8 pm I watch a television programme called Dallas. After I have watched that, I clean my teeth with a plastic brush and then I go to bed.
